install.name: Find Us on Facebook
install.author: River Media
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2005 - 2010 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module will display a "Find Us On Facebook" link with your choice of 4 images.

param.name: facebook_url
param.label: Facebook URL
param.description: Enter the URL to your Facebook page.

param.name: target
param.label: Target
param.description: Target window when the link is clicked

param.name: title_text
param.default: Visit our Facebook page and become a fan.
param.label: Title Text
param.description: Enter the text you want to show in the title pop up

param.name: image_choice
param.label: Image Choice
param.description: Select which image you would like

param.name: image_align
param.label: Image Alignment
param.description: Choose image alignment, left, right or center

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
